channel.title: Ibrahim Alhas - News & Updates
channel.description: Latest updates, news, and projects from Ibrahim Alhas

item.title: Joined University of Cambridge's Department of Zoology
item.description: Joined the University of Cambridge's Department of Zoology for a research project as the sole Research Software Engineer.
item.author: ibrahim.alhas@example.com (Ibrahim Alhas)

item.title: Promoted to Lead Software Engineer at LCFI
item.description: Promoted to Lead Software Engineer at the Leverhulme Centre for the Future of Intelligence Institution (LCFI), University of Cambridge.
item.author: ibrahim.alhas@example.com (Ibrahim Alhas)

item.title: Joined LCFI as Software Engineer
item.description: Joined the Centre for the Future of Intelligence at the University of Cambridge as Software Engineer.
item.author: ibrahim.alhas@example.com (Ibrahim Alhas)

item.title: Graduated with MSc in AI from King's College London
item.description: Graduated with a Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence from King's College London (KCL).
item.author: ibrahim.alhas@example.com (Ibrahim Alhas)

item.title: Started Game Development Project "ItLivesInTheWoods"
item.description: Game development project "ItLivesInTheWoods" started as a solo side project, later to be a Steam commercial release.
item.author: ibrahim.alhas@example.com (Ibrahim Alhas)

item.title: Graduated with BSc in Computer Science
item.description: Graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from the University of Westminster.
item.author: ibrahim.alhas@example.com (Ibrahim Alhas)
